analysis.description:
SignalToken.balances (/unique_chucks/48/0x0fe213bac9e8308fa05fc7d53926c6c597f97410.sol#63) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- doTransfer (/unique_chucks/48/0x0fe213bac9e8308fa05fc7d53926c6c597f97410.sol#117-151)
	- balanceOfAt (/unique_chucks/48/0x0fe213bac9e8308fa05fc7d53926c6c597f97410.sol#188-200)
	- generateTokens (/unique_chucks/48/0x0fe213bac9e8308fa05fc7d53926c6c597f97410.sol#242-255)
	- destroyTokens (/unique_chucks/48/0x0fe213bac9e8308fa05fc7d53926c6c597f97410.sol#255-268)
SignalToken.isContract (/unique_chucks/48/0x0fe213bac9e8308fa05fc7d53926c6c597f97410.sol#316-324) is declared view but contains assembly code

Reentrancy in SignalToken.approve (/unique_chucks/48/0x0fe213bac9e8308fa05fc7d53926c6c597f97410.sol#154-169):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(TokenController(controller).onApprove(msg.sender,_spender,_amount)) (/unique_chucks/48/0x0fe213bac9e8308fa05fc7d53926c6c597f97410.sol#161-165)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- allowed (/unique_chucks/48/0x0fe213bac9e8308fa05fc7d53926c6c597f97410.sol#165)
empty in SignalToken.transfer (/unique_chucks/48/0x0fe213bac9e8308fa05fc7d53926c6c597f97410.sol#98-99) is a local variable never initialiazed
empty in SignalToken.transferFrom (/unique_chucks/48/0x0fe213bac9e8308fa05fc7d53926c6c597f97410.sol#107) is a local variable never initialiazed

SignalToken.claimTokens (/unique_chucks/48/0x0fe213bac9e8308fa05fc7d53926c6c597f97410.sol#333-341) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(controller,balance) (/unique_chucks/48/0x0fe213bac9e8308fa05fc7d53926c6c597f97410.sol#338-340)

SignalToken.getValueAt.min (local variable @ /unique_chucks/48/0x0fe213bac9e8308fa05fc7d53926c6c597f97410.sol#288-289) shadows:
	- SignalToken.min (function @ /unique_chucks/48/0x0fe213bac9e8308fa05fc7d53926c6c597f97410.sol#324-327)

SignalToken.isContract uses assembly (/unique_chucks/48/0x0fe213bac9e8308fa05fc7d53926c6c597f97410.sol#316-324)
	- /unique_chucks/48/0x0fe213bac9e8308fa05fc7d53926c6c597f97410.sol#321-324
